item.title: Magic on Players
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

Alright, Pissing me off pretty badly, i know how to add all this shit, but for some reason it’s different for my friend’s source it’s like foxscape or w/e, alright i Tried adding blitz/etc to his Magic on Players, but i get 100 errors, regaurdless, all he has is Ice Barrage…Here’s his code.

if(spellID == 12891){ if(actionTimer == 0) { if(playerLevel[6] > 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You need 4 "+getItemName(560)+", 4 "+getItemName(565)+" and 6 "+getItemName(555)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); actionTimer = 40; stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); PkingDelay = 45; castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 4); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93){ sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } } else { } } if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { hitDiff = EnemyHP; } mageXP = (hitDiff * 50); addSkillXP(mageXP, 6); addSkillXP(hitDiff, 3); castOnPlayer.hitDiff = hitDiff; castOnPlayer.KillerId = playerId; castOnPlayer.updateRequired = true; castOnPlayer.hitUpdateRequired = true; } catch(Exception E) { } }
appreciate Feedback, on why i can’t add it :s…

Read full topic
